0: Walls are very thin can hear others in rooms next door and hallway
The hotel lobby does not reflect the quality of the hotel
The lobby computer available for printing etc was too slow and did not work
They did offer free wi fi and there was a computer w printer in the lobby
The facility of the showerom was little old and flashing system of the bathroom was broken down
The aerobic equipment is quite old
Worth for what we were paying for I just wish there came a lobby breakfast along with the Stay
For its older look the accommodations are more on the modern side
1: Loved the piano player in the lobby
Nice rooms and hotel with gym on the top level
the hotel gym was clean and busy in the evening
I liked the room decor and the amenities for someone coming from a rural area it was a nice gesture to have the earplugs by the bedside
It has a brand new gym on the 9th floor that has everything you need
The lobby and the rooms are both decorated in an modern style that I liked
The lobby was bright and comfortable
Cianika worked the Pm shift very sweet and immediately got whatever we requested towels toiletries etc
Great location great staff and great facilities
